title: The last update you'll ever need
content: ...because the new version of the app comes with an auto-updater. You'll be able to download and install new versions straight from the app. Aside from this, version 13 adds support for custom liveries, multiple save slots, and features a much improved navigation. Your existing save slot will be automatically migrated to the new version, so you can just install it and keep on playing.

title: Open Wheel content
content: v12 of the app is now available for download and brings a full open wheel career ladder. Compatible with ongoing careers, as always!
